name: lemon drizzle socks
notes:
*a sweet treat in the afternoon, with some knitting, and a cup of tea is one of my favourite things to do before the busyness of teatime and getting ready for work or school the next day. this collection is inspired by some of my favourites, all bringing delightful memories of picking fruits from the garden and baking with my grannyâ€¦. sweet comfort.*

a top down sock with heel flap and gusset, the pattern is worked on the front of the sock, increases and decrease form the lace patterns which echoes the lemon drizzling down the side of a cake.

sizes
small, (medium, large) finished sock circumference unstretched, 19 ( 21.5, 24 ) cm / 7.5 ( 8.5, 9.5 ).

skill level
a basic understanding of sock construction, how to work knits, purls, increases, decreases and kitchener stitch.

this pattern has been tested and tech edited.

kits available at: https://www.adventuresinyarncraft.co.uk/


  [1]: https://www.adventuresinyarncraft.co.uk/
